Welcome to OPSource Documentation
================================

.. image:: _static/logo.png
   :alt: OPSource Logo
   :align: center

OPSource is a comprehensive trading platform that combines advanced AI/ML capabilities with high-performance trading engines and enterprise integration features.

Components
---------

    .. grid-item-card:: Anya AI/ML Engine

    .. grid-item-card:: Dash33 Trading Engine
        :link: dash33/index

    .. grid-item-card:: Enterprise Integration
        :link: enterprise/index

        Tools and APIs for enterprise system integration and customization.

    .. grid-item-card:: Mobile Platform

        :link-type: doc

        Mobile-first trading platform with real-time market data.

Key Features
-----------

* Advanced AI/ML Trading (Anya)
* High-Performance Trading (Dash33)
* Enterprise System Integration
* Mobile-First Design
* Real-Time Analytics
* Multi-Factor Security
* REST and WebSocket APIs
* Comprehensive Documentation
